metadata.title: CVE-2021-46930 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:usb: mtu3: fix list_head check warningThis is caused by uninitialization of list_head.BUG: KASAN: use-after-free in __list_del_entry_valid+0x34/0xe4Call trace:dump_backtrace+0x0/0x298show_stack+0x24/0x34dump_stack+0x130/0x1a8print_address_description+0x88/0x56c__kasan_report+0x1b8/0x2a0kasan_report+0x14/0x20__asan_load8+0x9c/0xa0__list_del_entry_valid+0x34/0xe4mtu3_req_complete+0x4c/0x300 [mtu3]mtu3_gadget_stop+0x168/0x448 [mtu3]usb_gadget_unregister_driver+0x204/0x3a0unregister_gadget_item+0x44/0xa4

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
